page.title: 09POPULATION IN SUTTON IN A.
page.content:
Our square is in the Sutton in Ash. Sub-district of the Mansfield District of registration.The population of Sutton is about 41,270.It is staying level at this number. Miss A.Stendall is a registrar.She records births,marriages and deaths for this district in three books.When the books are full they go to an airtight hold in Mansfield Registry Office.She told us that about 650 deaths and 3500 births were recorded last year.The reason the number of births is so high is because people come from miles around to the Dukeries Maternity Unit of King's Mill.
Mr. Dean's class.Forest Glade primary school.
